articles.title: Tony Allen: the Afrobeat pioneer's 10 finest recordings - The Guardian
articles.description: From simmering dancefloor fillers to defiant resistance anthems, we pick the best of the legendary drummer’s tracks

Fela Kuti: Roforofo Fight (Roforofo Fight, 1972)
Fela Kuti: Roforofo Fight video
Roforofo Fight is the earliest cohesive expression of Tony Allen and saxophonist Fela Kutis Afrobeat sound: part Yoruba polyrhythm, … [+6787 chars]

articles.description: Prine Harry celebrates 75 years of a beloved children's cartoon, as Camilla reveals the unexpected exercise routine keeping her fit and healthy.

The 35-year-old spoke of the meaningful impact the beloved British show has had on children for the past seven decades.
